ygData.subject: Re: Petition
ygData.msgSnippet: Hang your head for me, also.     I ve started a Bard, a Ranger, and a Druid. Leri ... From: Jones, Brian  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Hang your head for me, also. <SMILE> I've started a Bard, a Ranger, and a
Druid.

Leri
-----Original Message-----

Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Petition

with

>> skill
